name: A Square Fight
description:
Ever wanted to shoot your friends? Well, I sure hope not. But still, now you can! shoot it out and battle for the most points, all on one device! A Square Fight has a VERY minimalistic art style, with customizable games! you can choose the winning score, and even set the names of the players. There is also a practice mode for players who just wanna try out the gameplay, although the AI is very limited. You can even get power-ups! Right now there is only one, (The Swirl), but I hope to expand that in the future if this game continues.

NOTE: I am aware the aspect ratio and cropping are messed up. It will be fixed in the future :)
